summary: Implemented main entry points for CoherentBundle construction from consistent context. Main entry point construct_coherent_bmcs works with one new axiom (saturated_extension_exists). Context preservation theorem fully proven. Multi-family witness consistency remains open.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting partial completion with axiom for saturation

partial_progress.details: Phase 1 complete (initial bundle). Phase 2 complete for singleton bundles. Phases 3-4 axiomatized due to multi-family consistency gap. Phase 5 complete (main entry points).

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented CoherentBundle construction from consistent context with main entry point construct_coherent_bmcs and proven context preservation. The saturation step uses a new axiom (saturated_extension_exists) justified by standard Henkin construction, while singleton bundle consistency is fully proven.
